short_description_localized.en: Studio Room with Two King Beds - 495 Sq Ft / 46 sqm -Marble Bath - 55 gal tub - custom toiletries - Boudoir Chairs
short_description_localized.fr: Studio Room with Two King Beds - 495 Sq Ft / 46 sqm -Marble Bath - 55 gal tub - custom toiletries - Boudoir Chairs
short_description_localized.it: Studio Room with Two King Beds - 495 Sq Ft / 46 sqm -Marble Bath - 55 gal tub - custom toiletries - Boudoir Chairs

description_localized.en: Our Studio rooms offer genuine Italian luxury, with king size beds, spacious entrance foyers and seating areas, and lavish marble bathrooms. Elegant neoclassical lines work with a soothing color palette and bold Empire-style cherry wood furniture. It’s a combination of style, space and comfort seldom found in New York boutique hotels. Studio Room are located on floor 3 - 7.
